heading.name: Obesity
heading.definition: % of population, age 18 and older, who are currently overweight or obese.
heading.framework: Based on and adapted from CIHIâ€™s 2012 Indicator Technical Specifications (Nov 2012)

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT
IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.bmi <= ${lowerLimit.bmi} AND fin.bmi > 0, 1, 0 ) ) ,0 ) AS '% Under Weight',
IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.bmi BETWEEN ${lowerLimit.ideal} AND ${upperLimit.ideal}, 1, 0 ) ) ,0 ) AS '% Ideal Weight',
IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.bmi BETWEEN ${lowerLimit.overweight} AND ${upperLimit.overweight}, 1, 0 ) ) ,0 ) AS '% Over Weight',
IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.bmi >= ${upperLimit.bmi}, 1, 0 ) ) ,0 ) AS '% Obese',
IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.bmi = 0, 1, 0 ) ) ,0 ) AS 'BMI Not Recorded'
FROM (
SELECT
d.demographic_no AS patient, IFNULL( BMI.dataField, 0) AS bmi
FROM demographic d
-- BMI Screening -- Look for BMI index of 30 or more LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m1.id, m1.dataField, m1.demographicNo, m1.dateObserved FROM measurements m1 INNER JOIN ( -- assuming that the most recent BMI measurement will have the highest ID SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${bmi} AND demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY demographicNo ) m2 ON(m1.id = m2.id) ) BMI ON (d.demographic_no = BMI.demographicNo)
-- get the heights so that they can be filtered out. LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ROUND( AVG(dataField), 1) AS dataField, demographicNo FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${height} AND demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY demographicNo ) HT ON (d.demographic_no = HT.demographicNo)
-- exclude any patient that is pregnant LEFT JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, `status`, startDate FROM Episode WHERE DATE(startDate) > ${lowerLimit.date} GROUP BY demographicNo HAVING COUNT(demographicNo) > -1 ) PREG ON(PREG.demographicNo = d.demographic_no)
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND provider_no LIKE ${provider}
AND IFNULL( PREG.`status`, -1) NOT LIKE 'Current' AND IFNULL( HT.dataField, ${lowerLimit.height}) BETWEEN ${lowerLimit.height} AND ${upperLimit.height}
AND ( FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) ) / 365.25 ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} ) GROUP BY d.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(d.demographic_no) > -1 ) fin
